# food
A framework for out-of-distribution and anomaly detection.

## Installation
From the root directory run

```
  pip install .
```
or
```
  python setup.py install [--user]
```

## Usage
```
from food import AngleSoftmax
```

## Requirements
 * torch>=1.3.0
 * numpy>=1.16.0
 * cv2>=4.1.0
 * to be filled
